thread.section_title: Hotel Morgana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 3 night stay in March 2017
thread.title_full: 3 night stay in March 2017 - Review of Hotel Morgana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Gerri M
title: 3 night stay in March 2017
text: The Hotel Morgana was located near the Metro and easy access to Rome sights. The personnel were very helpful and accommodating to our needs. They assisted with transfer to/from the airport and answered any questions we had regarding places to eat/visit. Our room was immaculate, and the breakfast buffet was top notch. The even had a complimentary Happy Hour buffet on Friday and Saturday night. I would highly recommend the Hotel Morgana!
